messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Robyn - OT
messages.messageBody:
<<<<<Sorry I have lost your email so sorry this is going to the list. I
received
the book on behaviour last week and just wanted to let you know and thank
you again for it. I will start reading it soon. I always intend to the next
time I sit down to nurse, but that activity seems to make me sleepy, so I
end up sleeping more than reading. but will get to it,>>>>>

I'm glad it got there. Enjoy snoozing while you can!

Robyn L. Coburn

messages.subject: Robyn - OT
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Robyn, Sorry I have lost your email so sorry this is going to the list. I received the book on behaviour last week and just wanted to let you know and thank
messages.messageBody:
Hi Robyn,



Sorry I have lost your email so sorry this is going to the list. I received
the book on behaviour last week and just wanted to let you know and thank
you again for it. I will start reading it soon. I always intend to the next
time I sit down to nurse, but that activity seems to make me sleepy, so I
end up sleeping more than reading. but will get to it,



Thanks again!



Sherri-Lee

Need safe and natural health products?

http://www.aloeessence.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
